TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1225-1226
TEI.2.document_title: F. H. Rankin to Stephen F. Austin, 10-16-1825

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1225-1226

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Jacinto*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-16-1825">October the 16th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I am about to buy *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr Whitlock*/person_mentioned*s land */location_mentioned*provided you will take a part of it for your fees I am getting so much in your debt I am afraid I will never be able to pay you. this *location_mentioned*land of *person_mentioned*Whitlock*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* is not a very good League but it is Very well timbered and on the tide and some good upland and a good deal of Very good bottom land that overflows the situation of it I think will make it Valuable I would not hezatate to purchase the Land and become *person_mentioned*paymaster */person_mentioned*to you if I thought I could pay you in time but I Know I cant without you will take a part of the Land if you feel willing to do so you will please to let me know it as soon as possible, if you have any news respecting the *person_mentioned*indians*/person_mentioned* or any thing else I would be glad you would let us hear it as my old *person_mentioned*father*/person_mentioned* is anxious to here all he can and that from the best Sorce as he expects to set out for *location_mentioned*Alabama*/location_mentioned* in a short time and wishes to be able to give his *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned* the best information of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* he can you will do me a favour by writing me an answer by the first oppertunity*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*F H Rankin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
